instruction:
This time you are provided with a sentence and a corresponding pos tag. For each word of the sentence, give an example of a word with the same pos tag.
You should provide at least two examples.
input:
The opinion piece cleverly argues its point.
POS tagging:
The (Determiner) opinion (Noun) piece (Noun) cleverly (Adverb) argues (Verb) its (Pronoun) point (Noun).
output:
The: that, those
Opinion: idea, notion 
Piece: article, fragment
Cleverly: artfully, intelligently
Argues: reasons, expounds
Its: his, her
Point: aim, purpose
